person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A five-year-old girl in the east China city of Tianjin choked and almost died from cigarette smoke at her grandfather 's birthday with relatives smoking for hours in a small room , the Wen Hui Bao newspaper said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| five-year-old girl |
| grandfather |
| relatives (plural) |

These are the valid entities identified in the paragraph. The "newspaper" mentioned is not considered a person in this context.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| five-year-old girl |
| grandfather |

These are the valid entities identified in the paragraph that clearly refer to persons. The "relatives" are mentioned in a plural form and can refer to multiple people, so they are considered a single entity in this context. The "newspaper" (Wen Hui Bao) is not considered a person.
